Title: What We Do in the Shadows

Episodes.Title: The Return of Jerry
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Paul Simms
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires' long-lost fifth roommate returns.

Episodes.Title: Headhunting
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Jake Bender
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Guillermo gets a new job and Colin helps Laszlo make a new friend.

Episodes.Title: Sleep Hypnosis
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Marika Sawyer
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: A dispute over who gets to use the newly available empty room under the stairs gets out of control.

Episodes.Title: The Railroad
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Sam Johnson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Laszlo and Colin help neighbor Sean find a new job at the railroad at which they claim to work.

Episodes.Title: Nandor's Army
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Sarah Naftalis
Episodes.Actors: Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou, Harvey Guillén
Episodes.Plot: The vampires are sent on a mission to New Hampshire to retrieve Nandor, who has lost his mind.

Episodes.Title: Laszlo's Father
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Jake Bender
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Laszlo's father's ghost returns to make amends, while Nadja and Nandor deal with the shapeshifters who have moved in next door.

Episodes.Title: March Madness
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Jeremy Levick
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Laszlo and Nandor try to exorcise the demon who had possessed their neighbor Sean.

Episodes.Title: P.I. Undercover: New York
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Max Brockman
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Colin and Nadja have a couples' night with an old friend, while Nandor and Laszlo battle the film crew that have invaded their neighborhood.

Episodes.Title: Come Out and Play
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Shana Gohd
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires get blamed for a murder at a meeting of all the New York vampires and must find a way back to the safety of Staten Island.

Episodes.Title: The Promotion
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Lauren Wells, Taika Waititi
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Avaah Blackwell
Episodes.Plot: The vampires go to an office party to celebrate Guillermo's promotion.

Episodes.Title: The Finale
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Sam Johnson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Amid plans for drastic measures, unexpected news arrives, shifting everyone's focus and priorities.
